description: Manage Microsoft Playwright Testing service workspace resource.

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace create
commands.summary: Create a Microsoft Playwright Testing service Workspace resource.
commands.syntax:
az playwright-testing workspace create --name
                                       --resource-group
                                       [--local-auth {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--location]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--regional-affinity {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--reporting {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--scalable-execution {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--tags]
examples: az playwright-testing workspace create --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace --location westus --regional-affinity Enabled

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace delete
commands.summary: Delete Microsoft Azure Playwright Testing service Workspace resource.
commands.syntax:
az playwright-testing workspace delete [--ids]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--subscription]
                                       [--yes]
examples: az playwright-testing workspace delete --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace list
commands.summary: List Microsoft Azure Playwright Testing service Workspace resources by subscription ID.

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace show
commands.summary: Get a Microsoft Azure Playwright Testing service Workspace resource details.
examples: az playwright-testing workspace show --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace update
commands.summary: Update Microsoft Azure Playwright Testing service Workspace resource.
commands.syntax:
az playwright-testing workspace update [--add]
                                       [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--ids]
                                       [--local-auth {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--name]
                                       [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                       [--regional-affinity {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--remove]
                                       [--reporting {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--resource-group]
                                       [--scalable-execution {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                       [--set]
                                       [--subscription]
                                       [--tags]
examples: az playwright-testing workspace update --resource-group SampleRG --workspace-name myPlaywrightWorkspace --regional-affinity Disabled

commands.name: az playwright-testing workspace wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
